QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.id odf_pk, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.code as code, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.bsr_uom as bsr_uom, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.bsr_deploy_risk as bsr_deploy_risk, 'clr_bsr_staging' as odf_obj_type, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.additional_item1 as additional_item1, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.additional_item2 as additional_item2, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.bsr_variable_code as bsr_variable_code, ( SELECT P.PAGE_CODE FROM CMN_PAGES P WHERE P.ID in ( SELECT DECODE( CMN_PAGES.PRINCIPAL_TYPE, 'SYSTEM', CMN_PAGES.ID, NVL( CMN_PAGES.ORIGINATING_PAGE_ID, CMN_PAGES.ID ) ) FROM CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES, CMN_PAGES WHERE CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES.PAGE_FRAME_ID = CMN_PAGES.ID AND CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES.OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID = ODF_CA_CLR_BSR_STAGING.ID AND CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES.OBJECT_TYPE = 'clr_bsr_staging' ) ) as page_layout, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.bsr_rev_risk as bsr_rev_risk, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.last_updated_date as last_updated_date, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.bsr_group as bsr_group, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.bsr_type as bsr_type, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.bsr_variable as bsr_variable, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.bsr_current_score as bsr_current_score, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.product as product, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.bsr_category as bsr_category, (NVL((SELECT 1 FROM DUAL WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 from NMC_CONVERSATIONS TC WHERE TC.RESOURCE_NAME='clr_bsr_staging' AND TC.RESOURCE_ID = odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.id)), 0)) as has_conversations, (select audit_tmplt_created.full_name from (select full_name, user_id from srm_resources) audit_tmplt_created where audit_tmplt_created.user_id = odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.created_by) as created_by, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.ODF_BLUEPRINT_ID as odf_blueprint_id, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.bsr_data_value as bsr_data_value, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.bsr_load_date as bsr_load_date, (select audit_tmplt_updated.full_name from (select full_name, user_id from srm_resources) audit_tmplt_updated where audit_tmplt_updated.user_id = odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.last_updated_by) as updated_by, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.name as name, NVL( odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.odf_blueprint_id, (select id from odf_blueprints b where b.type = NLS_UPPER('clr_bsr_staging') and b.is_default = 1 ) ) as odf_blp_active_id, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.created_date as created_date, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.partition_code as partition_code, odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging odf_ca_clr_bsr_staging where 1 = 1
